Package at.peirleitner.core.manager

Class LanguageManager

java.lang.Object
at.peirleitner.core.manager.LanguageManager
public class LanguageManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manager for message handling.
Messages registered via #registerNewMessage(String, String) will be placed in the default language file #getFile(Language) with the default language being getDefaultLanguage().

Drastic changes have been made in v1.0.5, not all methods may be available before that.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Markus Peirleitner (Rengobli)
